mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_shuffling (shuffling_name, url, weight, online_time, image, sort, create_by, create_time,cate) VALUES (#{shuffling_name}, #{url}, #{weight},#{online_time}, #{image}, #{sort}, #{create_by}, #{create_time},#{cate});
mapper.update: UPDATE t_shuffling SET shuffling_name = #{shuffling_name}, url = #{url}, weight = #{weight}, online_time = #{online_time}, image = #{image}, sort = #{sort}, update_by = #{update_by}, update_time = #{update_time} WHERE id=#{id};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_shuffling WHERE id =#{id} AND is_deleted =0
